messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Stuff to build
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/16/2002 10:44:39 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... WHat a cool list --- thank you so much!!!!! I m so glad you realized that I am so
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/16/2002 10:44:39 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
jnjstau@... writes:


> bat houses
> bird houses or feeders
> dog houses
> ramps for bicycles (we use ours for goat kid toys)
> flats for seedlings
> window boxes
> toy boxes
> picnic table
> doll house
> hat rack
> shelves

WHat a cool list --- thank you so much!!!!! I'm so glad you realized that I
am so completely "lame" about this stuff that I wouldn't even have thought of
most of these things!!!!!

--pamS


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Stuff to build
messages.msgSnippet: Just off the top of my head: bat houses bird houses or feeders dog houses ramps for bicycles (we use ours for goat kid toys) flats for seedlings window boxes
messages.messageBody:
Just off the top of my head:

bat houses
bird houses or feeders
dog houses
ramps for bicycles (we use ours for goat kid toys)
flats for seedlings
window boxes
toy boxes
picnic table
doll house
hat rack
shelves

Julie
